Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.ImmutableDate

  • Packages that use ImmutableDate 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.items
    Contains all elements generated by CHART.JS, which are mapping java script objects, to use at runtime in plugins, events or controllers.

    • Uses of ImmutableDate in org.pepstock.charba.client.items

      Fields in org.pepstock.charba.client.items declared as ImmutableDate 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ImmutableDate ScaleValueItem.valueAsDate 
      Constructors in org.pepstock.charba.client.items with parameters of type ImmutableDate 
      Constructor and Description
      ScaleValueItem(ImmutableDate value, String label)
      Creates the object with the value retrieved from the scale, value as Date.
      Used for AxisType.TIME and AxisType.TIMESERIES scales.
